column4: hey, i have a virtualised ubuntu web-server. On tuesday i'll be working from a machine i don't have root to.
Ideally I'd edit the /etc/hosts file to point certain domains at my webserver.
As I won't have root access, my idea was to setup tinyDNS or equivalent. add my domains there, and then change the browsers proxy to the IP of the server, would that work?
Please don't flood; use http://paste.ubuntu.com to paste; don't use Enter as punctuation.
